t: Amazon continues to be consumers’ favourite brand in 2020, driven ...
s: June 8, 2022 - Amazon turned out to be the most mentioned brand when consumers were asked who their favourite brands are, with 15% of consumers naming it, followed by John Lewis (4%), Sainsbury’s (4%), and Tesco (3%).

t: 2020 Favourite Brand: Amazon, but relationship weak - ChannelX ...
s: January 11, 2021 - Amazon has been listed by consumers as their 2020 favourite brand, closely followed by John Lewis , M&S, Sainsbury’s , and Tesco

t: Amazon named consumers' favourite brand - Retail Gazette
s: January 22, 2019 - Amazon has been named by consumers as their favourite brand, with other retailers such as Marks & Spencer, John Lewis, Sainsbury’s and Tesco following close behind.

t: Amazon extends lead as consumers’ favourite brand in 2020, DMA reports
s: January 6, 2021 - According to the Data & Marketing Association’s (DMA) latest research, Amazon has been listed by consumers as their favourite brand in 2020.

t: UK Consumers' Favourite Brands revealed - And Amazon is top - Digital Marketing Solutions Summit | Forum Events
s: February 11, 2021 - The DMA has revealed the findings of its latest ‘How to win Trust and Loyalty’ research, which set out to gauge which brands UK consumers are most loyal towards. Amazon turned out to be the most mentioned brand, with 15% of consumers naming it, followed by John Lewis (4%), Sainsbury’s ...

t: Amazon named consumers’ favourite brand - Netimperative
s: January 21, 2019 - Amazon has been named by consumers as their favourite brand, with retail stalwarts Marks & Spencer, John Lewis, Sainsbury’s and Tesco the others most mentioned, according to new research. The study, from the DMA, also found that Amazon was the only brand to feature inside the top five across ...

t: One In Four Name Amazon As Their Favorite Retail Brand, Study Shows
s: July 18, 2016 - Amazon is customers' favourite retail brand, preferred by one in four shoppers (25%), according to a survey conducted by the UK trade marketing association DMA. High street stalwarts John Lewis (14%) and Marks & Spencer (10%) were voted the next in line.

t: Lego is Brits' favourite brand, but Amazon named most 'relevant' | The Drum
s: April 8, 2019 - For the second year in a row, UK consumers have named Lego as their favourite brand. However, when asked to name the company they considered most relevant to their lives, Amazon took the crown.

t: r/FulfillmentByAmazon on Reddit: Best Of The Big Brands Selling On Amazon?
What Is Amazon Brand Gating? (And How to Protect Your Sales With It)
s: What is Amazon brand gating? Brand gating on Amazon prevents counterfeit sellers from selling your product, so you can earn more Amazon sales.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

s: Amazon has become a fashion destination in its own right, and these 15 brands are our absolute favorites for finding beautiful clothing for every occasion.
